hypothesis_content.title: Bull-to-Neutral Transition Warning via SOL Momentum Divergence
hypothesis_content.statement: In BULL regime, when SOL price makes a new 10-day high but its 3-day Chaikin Money Flow (CMF) shows lower high (negative divergence), a regime transition to NEUTRAL occurs within 7 days with SOL underperforming BTC by >7% over next 10 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: SOL often leads altcoin momentum in bull markets. Price新高 with weakening money flow indicates distribution and fading institutional/whale interest, typically preceding broader regime cooling as capital rotates to safety.
entry_conditions: SOL 3-day CMF < prior CMF peak when price last made 10-day high

exit_conditions.take_profit: Market regime transitions to NEUTRAL OR SOL underperforms BTC by 9%
exit_conditions.stop_loss: SOL makes another new 10-day high with confirming CMF > prior peak

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Regime remains BULL beyond 10 days with SOL continuing to outperform BTC.
